title: AI doesn't have initiative to cast "fog" spells to protect itself when attacked, especially when overwhelmed by attackers in number

comments.body:
Fog effects now use the Block timing

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body:
this timing will solve this AI issue?
or there might be something else prepared to handle this too?
comments.author: [huanghon...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/117260737072923055970/)

comments.body:
Timings limit when the AI can cast certain spells, or activate abilities. The timings for fog-like effects were changed in February this year from 'pump' to 'block'

Pump timing would only activate during the AI's declare attackers phase (or the main phase) before getting to the block phase.
